title: Seattle City Council 5/17/22
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
Pursuant to Washington State Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.15 and Senate Concurrent Resolution 8402, this public meeting will be held remotely. Meeting participation is limited to access by the telephone number provided on the meeting agenda, and the meeting is accessible via telephone and Seattle Channel online.

Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Presentations, Approval of Consent Calendar, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; CB 120307: Seattle Police Department’s use of Audio Recording Systems; CB 120309: Seattle Police Department’s use of IBM i2 iBase; Res 32051: revising certain General Rules and Procedures of the Seattle City Council.
0:00 Call to Order
9:59 Public Comment
22:11 CB 120307: Seattle Police Department’s use of Audio Recording Systems
28:35 CB 120309: Seattle Police Department’s use of IBM i2 iBase
31:18 Res 32051: revising certain General Rules and Procedures of the Seattle City Council
